name: @bmad-modules/warhammer-veteran
description: Comprehensive AI assistance for Warhammer 40k players - army building, rules judging, painting guides, lore exploration, campaign management, and hobby advice
author: Node

scripts.bmad:update: npm update bmad-method bmad-method-test-architecture-enterprise && if [ -f _bmad/_config/manifest.yaml ]; then npx bmad install --action quick-update --directory . --yes; else echo 'No bmad installation found â€” run npx bmad install manually first'; fi
